column1: Little Goat Diner////It's a decent place
column2: but as I and my friends have found
column3: it kind of gets progressively worse each time you go. I've really had some great stuff here
column4: but other times have been underwhelming. On balance
column5: it's good -- I think the goat chili cheese fries and loco moco have been consistently the best things to get. It just pales in comparison to its big sister across the street.
